app.title: Mystic AI - Tarot Readings
app.jsRequired: You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.

tarotChat.welcome: Welcome to ✨ Mystic AI ✨ — your portal to hidden insights! Please ask your question now to unlock guidance about your future, relationships, or career. Your destiny awaits!
tarotChat.consultCards: I'm sensing an energy around your question. Let me consult the cards with a three cards spread.
tarotChat.reading: Reading the cards and channeling the energies...
tarotChat.errorReading: I am unable to interpret the cards at this moment. The spiritual connection is unclear.
